name: Square Fighter
description:
Control your character to fight the opposition and throw them out of the combat zone! The more damage you inflict upon your oponent, the easier it will be to eject them out of the arena.

Anything is permitted so don't expect a clean fight. Use the unique fighting moves of each character to become the new champion!

FEATURES
- Includes 6 unlockable characters, each with a unique skill
- Earn coins after every battle to unlock other characters
- Includes 3 arenas with beautiful graphics
- Play the solo mode or the team mode - fight on your own or with your team!
